Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Very tasty authentic Thai food in Amsterdam. Beautiful decoration, good atmosphere, and friendly service. ‚Ä¶

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Food tasted ok, only Padthai and porpia are quite good. But cocktail is amazing!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Long waiting time despite reservation, but it was worth it. Delicious food. Great drinks!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Tasty and well presented food at reasonable price. The restaurant is well decorated and the staff are friendly which makes a difference for a place with such a central location.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: An excelent dinner. Might not be a very classical thai place but the atmosphere is great, the food is awesome and the staff was very kind and helpful. The prices are also not that high for this kind of food.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text:
Beautiful Brasserie with a very nice Bar. Located in a cosy alley near the shopping mile.
The staff is very friendly. The Food is excellent and pure delight. The Chefs really know their bussines. This is the perfect place for original thai and isaan food.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Delicious! Great food, very good prices, friendly staff! Just perfect ;)

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Top restaurant, great food, a little more expensive but realy worthwhile with a great service, book in advance!You want regret it!!!!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: It was a excellent dinner. The food and drink was so great. Staffs was friendly and service was great to.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Amazing authentic Thai food‚Ä¶with a very interesting menu! Stunningly beautiful restaurant and bar. Superb friendly service. This is a world-class place!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Staff was excellent! Food is delicious! If you love spicy be sure to approach one of the staff to have the spiciest chili flakes in town haha. Pad thai was super tasty as well as the tom yam. Will definitely be back

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Went there for a company team building. Three floors, pretty interior design. On the third floor there is sound system and even karaoke, very interesting. The food tastes great, the presentation is appealing too. Highly recommended.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Amazing place in the heart of Amsterdam!! ! We love Boy the manager and his crew. The place is bigger than you'd expect from the outside. Super charming and classy yet very cozy. They are so helpful, kind and love karaoke! Visit Silom Thai for a great time with great food! 5 stars! Kapunkap!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: This is the best Thai food you‚Äôll find in Amsterdam or maybe all of Holland. Authentic, spicy, full of flavor, cooked incredibly well, and many options for every taste! They have dishes you would only find in Thailand and there are even ‚Ä¶

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: I was very pleasantly surprised by the interior design not seen from the entrance! Tasty food!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Great food and lovely people! :)

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Food's very good, nice and spicy. Lovely flavours, tender lamb, the morning glory salad was yummy. Service could be better, then again the place was quite packed. Friendly staff.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Tasty Thai food, nice atmosphere and decent prince. I strongly recommend the Salmon curry and the Chicken pad thai.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Great food, special dishes and a good atmosphere - definitely a place to visit again!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text:
Second time here and just as great; lovely setting and very friendly staff.

Flexible regarding my requirements as a coeliac; so if you need gluten free ‚Ä¶

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: The best thai food I‚Äôve ever had in the Netherlands. Some are really authentic according to our thai friends.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: One of my favorite Thai restaurant in Amsterdam. Absolutely delicious!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Nice Palace to enjoy a great Thai meal. The interior is simply amazing and the good is authentic. Perfect.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Amazing food, great staff/service. We had a wonderful night.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text:
Really delicious food, pad Thai and salmon curry dish were really tasty
Wonderfully decorated interior

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: The Thai coconut soup with chicken was one of the best soups I‚Äôve ever had and the green curry fried rice was a simple but super aromatic and satisfying dish. Service was excellent, friendly and very fast!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Amazing food! Crocodile meat and seafood in a coconut is a blast.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Our group had a great experience at this restaurant. Food was great (both veggie and meat options) and the staff was very friendly and patient.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Feel like in Thailand again! Great food and service, highly recommend!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Very good thai restaurant in the city centre of Amsterdam. Tasty food, typical thai dishes and nice staff.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Great service, friendly stuff and authentic food

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Super noisy and impossible to have a conversation during dining, my ears literally hurt. Bad and slow service, it has been more than 1.5hr and we are still waiting for the main dish‚Ä¶Don‚Äôt recommend

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: My friends took me for my birthday here and it was an amazing experience. Friendly servers, great food (had the pink fried rice, grasshoppers and cayman). Interior of the restaurant is over the top yet tasteful. Liked the combination of the ‚Ä¶

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: I've been waiting two years for a chance to go back. I hope that Covid will be under control enough that it will be possible at the end of the summer. Delicious food, great service... wonderful experience!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Nice and cozy atmosphere. The staff is very friendly which is rare in The Netherlands. Food is fresh and delicious. Had a little disappointment when ordered the delivery as we found out that the dishes we‚Äôve ordered for the delivery came twice smaller than they were at the location.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: The BEST Thai food we have had in all of the Netherlands! So good we didn‚Äôt even take pictures. The restaurant is very cool with great atmosphere and the food was flavorful, spicy when it was called out and cooked to perfection. Highly recommend!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Wow the Pad Thai here is amazing!! So so good! So much flavour and not greasy at all unlike so many Pad Thais I have. My only issue was the spring rolls. Although tasty, they only provide 2 and cut them in half so it looks like you have more. Great service though too!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text:
Best Thai restaurant in Amsterdam center. A modern decor with Thai street food it's so delicious.
Had fun time, the waitress was pleasant suggesting what is authentic speciality ‚Ä¶

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: The restaurant you don't expect in the heart of Amsterdam, in the middle of the tourists path (well, actually a bit hidden in a secondary street). The food was just amazing, I never eat Thai before so I cannot judge if it was real Thai, ‚Ä¶

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Really good thai, the place is nice. I had a san man chicken (chicken, nuts sauce and potatoes) ans fried rice it was really good.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Great food, very fresh, the guys in the kitchen know their stuff

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Just wow! Stumbled across this when looking for Thai food. Beautiful looking restaurant with very friendly staff. ‚Ä¶

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: I love the whole experience of this place. Delicious food and the place itself has  a very good vibe. The phad Thai is super delicious. The curries are exquisite. Do you try the Vietnamese beer.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: One of the best Thai restaurants in town! One of very few where you can find authentic thai cuisine, northern Thai, Southern Thai, tasty and served by best service you can find in town! Amazing interior, super lovely staff. Perfect place to ‚Ä¶

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: At first I did not want to give a review. I would like to keep this hidden treasure for myself. Silom is my new favourite restaurant. Love the food and the style of the restaurant. Thai fine dining at it's best. Very friendly staff and owners. Do not get too popular,  please !

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: One word to explain everything" delicious"!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Been a long time customer of their other restaurant Bird and the food is always great. Silom has even better food but the service is unbelievably poor. BOTH times I have visited Silom the service has either been incredibly slow OR just absent. It is really a shame because the food is great.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: We arrived 40 minutes becore closing time and only 2 other guests astill there. The service was amazing and the food from another planet. Best thai food we had in years. Very authentic. Prices are moderate. Thanks to the kitchen and service team for making it a fantastic dining experience.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text:
WOW, that was amazing. The food was very, very good, the service was very friendly and overall it was a really great experience!!!
We will definitely come back to this great place when we‚Äôre in Amsterdam next time again.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Delicious, fresh and really tasty food , wonderful, friendly staff , can't wait to go back !

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: The same folks from my favorite thai restaurant in Amsterdam, Bird thai have this beautiful place near Rokin. Super spacious, beautiful and lovely food. Sounds great. ‚Ä¶

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: The staff was hilarious, the food was great quality. Not the dishes I was expecting, and pay attention what you order! They have 2 different menu's.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Great thai restaurant in Amsterdam. Love papaya salad (som tum). Good quality food and great service. I wish we would have this restaurant in Melbourne. If you are in town and looking for authentic thai food in Amsterdam, this is the place.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Very tasty thai food. Just like in Thailand

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Food is good. Service can be better, one person got half the amount of food we had, staff said they will come back to us but never came. Even the owner did not offer a new dish or compensation

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Fantastic real Thai food in a lovely ambiance and great personnel. You can choose from the "golden oldies" of the Bird plus more Asian cuisine from various parts of Thailand.

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Very delicious! I had big fish with mango and thai herbsauce. Moo ping, somtam and tom yum kung all tasted perfect: the same as in Thailand. I'll be back for sure. ‚Ä¶

Review Text:
Absolutely amazing!! Lovely staff and GREAT food. Best Thai we've had!!

Name: Silom Thai Brasserie
Review Text: Authentic thai food with a twist (if you feel like it). Delicious and well-prepared.Trendy and tasteful environment, the owner was welcoming, friendly and caring. Thank you!
